I think it is a reasonable idea to keep the competition related topics in the same namespace.

I have checked a couple of the tasks, and it already appears that /vrx is the standard namespace for task related topics.  For example, all the station keeping related topics in the second screenshot are grouped together under /vrx.

Regards,

Jonathan.
